name: TV TCL 24D3100 (MS366BP1-AP)
origAbout: USB 2.0 has maximized the transmission speed and increased bandwidth which could be used in two unidirectional data paths: one is to receive data and the other is to transmit data. WIFI 2.4G - Enjoy your favorite on-demand content at a great lick through your existing network with built-in Wi-Fi. HDMI 1.4 supports high speed in picture transmission, allows it to send audio data “upstream” to a surround audio system, eliminating the need for a separate audio cable.
